bibl.title: William Spears and James McGough v. King County. Summary of Court Findings.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.ab: Case in Justice Court No. 336 Territory of Washington vs Wm Spears + James McGough Defendants
div1.p:
a charge was made and filed this date November 2, 1883 against the Defendants by and on oath of Bernance McCroary Charging the defendants of obtaining the Sum of 100.00 on first Practices fully set forth in compliant on information a warrant was issued The Deputy in Court pleaded no guilty his Hanford appears for Defendant and J G Hecines for the Territory The Defendants entered into sufficent security for the appearance in court insitute The case could be heard said how the case is called at The hour of 7:30 PM Nov. 6th 1883 and a part of the testimony heard and was continued until 7:30 oclock PM No. 8 1883 and at that time the case was again called all being present in court and the testimony of several witnesses was taken the defendants offering no
testimony and after hearing the argument of allowing the Court Took the Matter under advisement until once oclock PM Nov 9th 1883 and at this time The Court being fully conviened at to The Law + The Treachery considered and conveyance. That The defendants are justly as charged in The information and they are regarded to enter recognizance for their appearance at the next turn of the district court to be held at Seattle King County WT in the sum of one hundred dollars each of them for their said appearance and and Defendants are so held in sum by this court.
div1.ab: Dated this the 9th day of November 1883
The defendants freely to join the was consituted for the court.
div1.p: Treat Ceoat to JH Cann JP one of 25 one arrested 1st 1.25 fitry 2 Paps 30 - Continued 50 .80 Docketful 25 judget 50 .75 Writing Testimony 50 Talking Bowell 2.00 2.50 one subp 25 - This transcript 60 .85 leiflets 50 - continued 1.00 1.50 $5.35
Court of H.S. Thorth Court Order Iny warrant on 2 defts 2.00 Custody of 2 defts 2.00 Judge .40 deputy .25 attendant on custody 2.00 665
div1.ab: This to visitation one day 2.20 To Deputy Clerk 1 day 2.20 T The Clerk 2.20
div1.p: I hereby certify that the above forgoing happened in a true and ciricut court of the truth and the whole truth of had in by Court - and that the Court bears it correct, that such the ferriers any had.
